title: work
comment: Work was ordained by God as a means of fulfilment, service and praise. It is to be supplemented by rest, following the pattern of God's creation of the world. Despite the effects of sin, work can still be honouring to God.

children.title: work, as ordained by God
children.comment: God ordained work as the normal routine of living. Every legitimate human task, therefore, is of intrinsic worth, however menial it may seem, and is potentially a means of glorifying God.

children.title: Work is ordained by God

seealsos.comment: Work is part of the rhythm of life.
